content.text: Proposed pathways should be evaluated using detailed maps. The optimum pathway should avoid critical areas (e.g. risk of dredging, ships anchors, tidal flow) and steep underwater gradients.

Where vessels are to be used to install the cable, computer aids should be applied to manage the  positioning and movement of the vessel in order to control the pulling force applied to, and the feeding of  cable.
